name: Dal Tadka
ingredients: Toor dal (split pigeon peas), tomatoes, onions, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, red chili powder, ghee, cumin seeds, mustard seeds, asafoetida, green chilies, curry leaves, and coriander leaves.
prep_instructions: Cook dal until soft. In a separate pan, heat ghee, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and asafoetida. Add onions, tomatoes, and spices. Mix the tadka into the cooked dal.
serving_instructions: Serves 3-4 people. Serve with rice or chapati.
